FuncDef: This command is used for satellites. It identifies to the SR OS that there is an internal connection between two ports.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies one port of an internal port connection. These ports can be router ports or Ethernet satellite uplink ports. Acceptable pairings are defined in the command description. Values-port-id|(Router port)|, |slot/mda/port||, ||slot|The slot number of the card in the chassis. The maximum slot number is platform dependent. Refer to the Install Guides for more information., ||mda |[1 to 2], ||port|[1 to 160] (depending on the MDA type), |||, |(Ethernet satellite uplink port)|, |esat-id/slot/uport||, ||esat |keyword, ||id |[1 to 20], ||slot |[1], ||u |keyword for up-link port, ||port |[1 to 4].
Specifies the keyword required to create the binding between the two ports.
